text: Marisa Letícia Lula da Silva (née Casa; 7 April 1950 - 3 February 2017) was the second wife of President of Brazil Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva. She served as the First Lady of Brazil from 2003 to 2010. She was born in São Bernardo do Campo, São Paulo. She had four children, three of which were fathered by Lula. Letícia died from a stroke on 3 February 2017 in São Paulo at the age of 66. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2017 deaths Category:First Ladies of Brazil Category:People from São Bernardo do Campo Category:Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva
title: Marisa Letícia Lula da Silva
